subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The Ryder Cup pits 12 polite and persevering men with similar American country club backgrounds against the three-time defending champion European team which is diverse in nationalities, backgrounds and interests.
snippet: The Ryder Cup pits 12 polite and persevering men with similar American country club backgrounds against the three-time defending champion European team which is diverse in nationalities, backgrounds and interests.
